translated: So too with the single-door and so on. And just as with the consciousnesses, so too with the associated mentality the inclusion should be understood according to the door of function. But there is this difference. For firstly, as regards function, the universals perform fourteen functions like consciousness in all instances. But the applied thought, sustained thought, and initiative perform nine functions, omitting the five beginning with seeing. And energy performs seven functions, omitting resolution and sustained application. And happiness performs six functions, omitting both applied thought and sustained application. And the abstinences and the two roots perform twenty functions, omitting the profitable and indeterminate roots. And zeal performs five functions, omitting both resolution and sustained application. And the two roots of non-greed and non-hate perform four functions, omitting the two beginning with resolution and their object. But the abstinences perform only the function of impulsion in the profitable. And as regards the door, the abstinences are only of the mind door. So too are compassion and gladness.
